about.title: About
about.p1: svift is an open source tool to turn your numbers into beautiful charts - in no time. Read more about the idea behind svift on Medium. If you would like to test svift, please sign up. Any questions? Get in touch with us: hello@svift.xyz
about.p2:
On the other hand, we denounce with righteous indignation and dislike men who are so beguiled and demoralized by the charms of pleasure of the moment, so blinded by desire, that they cannot foresee the pain and trouble that are bound to ensue.

pro.title: Pro*
pro.p1: svift will also soon be available as a pro tool for your organization. It includes advanced features and can be highly customized according to your needs.
pro.p2: For example, we can incorporate your corporate design (i.e. colors and/or custom fonts) or create new and exciting chart types that stand out.
pro.p3: Please get in touch with us if you are interested in getting to know more about our Pro options.
